main event: An observer reported a sighting of a descending object resembling a basketball, with green and red colors, in Beaulieu, Minnesota on 18 February 1956.
interesting points: The object was reported to be slowly descending to the northeast,The observer described the object as having colors similar to aircraft lights,The sighting concluded as possibly being an aircraft or a weather balloon,The reliability of the ground observer was rated as excellent,The weather at the time of the sighting was clear with no reported obstructions.
sighted object: one object resembling a basketball, colored green and red
